topic.title: How To Open a File as Read-Only in

body.p: This topic assumes that you are using a URLStreamHandler plugin to open the files in your repository. When a file is opened, your plugin is asked to provide a URLConnection object that uses to read the contents of the file.

By opening the file as read-only, the is instructed to visually warn users that the content of the document cannot edited. This is an alternative to having them edit the content and then receive an error when trying to check it in.
You can instruct the to open a file as read-only by implementing the java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderField(String) method to return a value of true for the oxygen_read_only header name.
